alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 04 at 3:21AM MDT until November 06 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MDT SATURDAY TO 9 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 AM MDT Saturday to 9 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds are expected to result in reduced visibilities in blowing and drifting snow late tonight through Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
